thread.title: 2018 WR Anthony Schwartz wins 'Fastest Man' at Miami regional
thread.title_full: 2018 WR Anthony Schwartz wins 'Fastest Man' at Miami regional

title: 2018 WR Anthony Schwartz wins 'Fastest Man' at Miami regional
text:
2018 WR Anthony Schwartz wins 'Fastest Man' at Miami regional The uncommitted three-star prospect is one of the quickest players in the 2018 class. â€” The Opening (@TheOpening) February 26, 2017 
Anthony Schwartz is showing others he's one of the fastest players in the 2018 class. 
Rated a three-star wide receiver per the 247Sports Composite, Schwartz (American Heritage High; Ft. Lauderdale, Fla.) flexed a sub 4.4 during Sunday's final day of testing to win the fastest man competition during Nike's Miami Opening regional inside the Miami Dolphins' practice facility. 
Schwartz (5-11, 165) is uncommitted and has 18 offers, including Notre Dame, Florida, Kentucky and UCLA among his most recent. 
Top players from 12 different regionals now through May will be invited to Nike's The Opening event in Beaverton, Oregon at Nike HQ over the summer. Author
